text: Arau te'om na'om nirmana karaiba dharaile, yetiya'i te'omra sampradayara netasakale te'omra ocaraedi para haichila, tetiya'i te'omra prati upahasa karaichila; te'om kaichila, â€˜tomaloke yadi amaka lai upahasa karaa, tente niscaya ami'o tomalokaka upahasa karaima, yenekai tomaloke upahasa karai achaâ€™
